title: PC Building is about to get WAY easier @ CORSAIR Computex 2023
description: Level up your desk game! Check out the Secretlab Magnus Desk Pro:   Corsair came to Computex with a plan -- to talk about FANS. Jake dropped by their booth to see what innovations Corsair has come up with to keep your PC cool, clean, and stylish.  Need fans now? Check out Corsairs Light Loop 120mm RGB fans:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 PC cable organization is a MESS! 0:35 iCUE Link Hub 1:03 QX Series hot swappable fans 3:20 Sponsor - Secretlab 3:51 iCUE Link AIOs 4:40 Custom watercooling components 5:20 Dominator Platinum RAM 5:36 Overall thoughts 5:58 Outro
